### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper mining operation at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and another burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Electricity generation at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities:
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and another pipe group at position(x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of following entities:
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
-  Ensure that burner entities have sufficient fuel to operate.
-  Check the status of burner entities to ensure they are not waiting for source items.

### Errors when using steam engines
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network.
-  Check the status of steam engines to ensure they are not empty or not working.

### Errors when using transport belts
-  Ensure that transport belts are not empty and are working properly.
-  Check the status of transport belts to ensure they are not blocked or not connected.

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined or invoked.
* No important variables have been assigned.
